sentences.english: An evaluation process of soil environmental quality by the mineralogical method is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 新提出土壤環境質量礦物學方法評價流程。

sentences.english: Mineralogy is a brand of the great earth science geology.
sentences.chinese: 礦物學是大地科學地質學的一個分支。

sentences.english: Do you see why I decided I need to learn more about minerals?
sentences.chinese: 這下明白我爲什麼要學習礦物學方面的知識了吧。

sentences.english: The characteristics of the technological mineralogy of kaolin directly decide its industrial utilization.
sentences.chinese: 高嶺土的工藝礦物學特徵直接決定着它的工業用途。

sentences.english: This experiment provides the basis for ihe solution of some petrological and mineralogical problems.
sentences.chinese: 本次實驗澄清了一些長期爭論的岩石學和礦物學問題。

sentences.english: A series of mineralogical parameters have been obtained.
sentences.chinese: 取得了一系列的礦物學參數。
